entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Grand Forks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:02 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 08:02 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:02 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 08:02 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
